thread.title: Obama's Call at U.N. to Fight ISIS With Ideas Is Largely Seen as Futile
thread.title_full: Obama's Call at U.N. to Fight ISIS With Ideas Is Largely Seen as Futile

title: Obama's Call at U.N. to Fight ISIS With Ideas Is Largely Seen as Futile
text:
30 Obama's Call at U.N. to Fight ISIS With Ideas Is Largely Seen as Futile 
The New York Times: UNITED NATIONS â€” President Obama called upon a conclave of world leaders on Tuesday to fight violent extremism not just with weapons but ideas, jobs and good governance, a strategy he has long advocated. There are few signs that it is succeeding.Military pressure, Mr. Obama said at a United Nations summit meeting, will be insufficient to vanquish groups like the Islamic State, also known as ISIS and ISIL.
